column2: The locals, whose vulgarate has changed so much from its classical roots, have begun to call themselves by the name of their conquerors--"Franc." The Romano-Gauls of Francia are becoming Frenchman.
Pah! The peasants no longer want to be "Roman..." how fitting.
Honhonhon civilizing baguette!A mon avis, la francais est la langue superieuse!
